mapper.select: select count(rno) total from tbl_reply where bid = #{bid}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_reply(bid, r_contents, replyer) values(#{bid}, #{r_contents}, #{replyer})
mapper.update: update tbl_reply set r_contents = #{r_contents}, update_date = now() where rno = #{rno}
mapper.select: select * from tbl_reply where bid = #{bid} order by rno desc limit #{startIndex}, #{cntPerPage}
